game.name: Blightstone
game.genres: 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: A challenging, turn-based strategy with a roguelike edge. Lead a team of adventurers to destroy the Blightstone and free the world from corruption. Use free movement, dynamic environments and collectable skills to save the crystal, and save the world.
